definitions.conditionExpression: For patients who have 1 of the following less well-validated risk factors (age 65 to 74 y, female gender, or CAD)
patient needs stroke prevention AND patient refuses OAC AND patient cannot tolerate aspirin-clopidogrel combination therapy
patient < 65 years and lone AF (including females)

non-valvular AF AND (previous stroke OR TIA OR systemic embolism OR LVEF (left ventricular ejection fraction) < 40% AND symptomatic heart failure AND (age >= 75 OR (age >=65 AND (diabetes OR coronary artery disease OR hypertension))))
recurrent (paroxymal or persistent) AF AND after cardioversion AND (high risk for drug-induced adverse effects OR high risk with infrequent recurrences of AF)
for patients with (persistent or permanent) AF
in patients with AF and HF who do not have an accessory pathway
In patients who experience symptoms related to AF during activity
